events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week as the size did not fit and I no longer want to keep it.
The request has been classified under the Refund cluster because the customer is asking for money back due to an issue with the product size.
The case has been assigned to representative Jane Smith to assist the customer with the refund process.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please confirm if the jacket was returned to our warehouse, and provide the order number and date of purchase to proceed with your refund?
Yes, I have already shipped the jacket back yesterday. The order number is 56789 and I purchased it on May 30th.
Thank you for the information. Once we receive and inspect the jacket, we will process your refund within 5 business days and notify you via email.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and helpful information about the refund timeline.
We have processed your refund for the returned jacket successfully. The amount should appear on your credit card statement within a few days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we will now close your case. Please feel free to contact us again if you need any further assistance.
